data.actual_result: Name seems to be more upwards and not centered with the avatar
data.expected_result: Name and avatar should be aligned and centered
data.short_description: In the emoji section in a server, under the "Uploaded By", name and avatar aren't aligned
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server - Upload an emoji - Observe the "Uploaded By" section, and the name and avatar under it
